content.rendered:
The 2023 Arkansas GenCyber Strength Training Program is a Summer CyberSecurity Experience.

Unlock your Cybersecurity potential with Gen Cyber! Get hands-on experience in the field and learn from experts in the industry. Join the next generation of cybersecurity leaders and be a part of securing our digital future.

Apply now for the exciting and education GenCyber program, open to rising 7th through 12th grade students.

June 19th-22nd & June 26th-29th, 8:30 AM to 12:30 PM.

Attend virtually or in person at our state-of-the-art Cyber Arena! The in-person camp will be held at UA Little Rock at 2801 S University Ave, Little Rock, AR.

This camp is open to students nationwide at no cost, but space is limited! You’ll need to submit an application to be considered. Prior experience is not necessary, and applications will be evaluated on students’ desire to be challenged and their willingness to learn.

Register today using this form.
